attributes.action: Bring back hanging for the murderers of "baby P"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Mr Prime Minister hear our plea and bring back hanging as a one off to rid this country of the vile 3 people who abused baby P to death. We as a people don't want the death sentance back for good but just as a one off to show that we WILL NOT tollerate these vile people.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/gooddeedneeded/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/safe4kids/
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
